185982853.review: Fun old-school game with lots going on.  Looking forward to more updates!

185978096.review: This is a fantastic game! It's hands-down the spiritual successor to Escape Velocity.

185969196.review: This is a really fun game!

185939018.review: Scratches my Escape Velocity itch real nice. Great UI, Great visuals, Well thought out storylines.

185916653.review: first introduced to this in Ubuntu, seems to have ported over to Steam nicely. simple enough game, and enough there to keep me going for more hours than i seem to be able to keep track of.

185909697.review: Fantastic open world space exploration game. Constantly adding new content to experience. Solid gameplay mechanics and its free to play.

185909545.review:
Not for me. 
Hated every minute.

185843972.review: Scratches that Star Wars kind of free trader itch.  Same kind of vibe as Privateer and other open world trade/bounty games, but in 2d and great performance.

185842853.review:
Un jeu qui ne semble pas extraordinaire aux premiers abords, mais qui se révèle bien plus prenant et intéressant qu'il n'y paraît.

Bon scénario, bon gameplay, gestion de sa flotte, de ses vaisseaux, diverses factions, missions variées, plusieurs chemins possibles pour percer en tant que capitaine de l'espace. Il y a énormément de choses à faire et à découvrir dans ce jeu, même quand on pense avoir finis, il reste encore pleins de mystères à découvrir.

Seul petit regret, il n'y a pas de musiques dans ce jeu, mais ça reste un très bon jeu.
Un niveau correct en anglais est souhaitable pour comprendre l'histoire et ses enjeux.

185685049.review:
This has been the most incredible trip into my childhood. I spent thousands of hours on Escape Velocity, EVO, and EVN. This game is the absolute best spiritual successor I could have dreamed of. I can't wait to explore the galaxy and find out the stories out there, so I can start exploring the mods too! 

The whole time I was setting up my first playthrough and learning all the controls and keybinds, I couldn't stop spazzing about everything to my boyfriend, telling him about how I remembered things and how perfectly this fit into place, like a lost puzzle piece. I am so happy. Thank you to everyone for your hard work on this game!!

If you enjoy ship customizations, trading and mission running, exploration and discovery, and awesome space-themed worldbuilding, you'll enjoy this game. You work your way up from nothing and it feels so rewarding to buy that huge, expensive ship and see your goals achieved.

Not to mention, this game ran like butter on my Surface Pro 9 (16gb of RAM) without even making the fans come on. I played for over an hour unplugged without hitting a power warning. That is unheard of. 

The literal only thing I have found that I dislike is the speed of the asteroids in some systems, and trying to decipher asteroid from ship can make my head spin a little. But since it's open source, it might be possible to make a pull request 😂

I'm so incredibly thrilled about this game and give it a very high recommend!!

185678596.review: play endless sky today download for free on the appstore

185537307.review: Game is absolute fire! Still updated from 2015 to 2024 and probably beyond, very cool dedication by the dev to stick with it and really craft something special. Greatly enjoying my time with it and a must if you're at all into space sim RPGs or even logistical fun like Shadow Empire etc.. (although it's way easier and less complex than Shadow Empire, don't worry!) Cheers dev and thanks for creating such a cool gem!

185420155.review: I am utterly impressed. I've wanted a decent space trading game for decades. This is it. This is the one. I can't believe it has taken this long for me to discover Endless Sky, and it was entirely by accident.

185281235.review: Been playing this game for many years. It itches that spot for space trading, space adventure, and spaceship upgrading, fighting, and pretty much anything you can expect from a game like this. It has a vast world. Many ship options, many upgrades, lots of variety, different missions, and different career paths. You can be a pirate, you can be a legit trader, you can work for the military, or just wander around. Simple yet beautiful graphics and effects. Small foot print. A great game that has been one that I always install because I know I'll feel the pull to fire up my ship again and explore the stars!

184995272.review: the reason dislike this game is due to the combat. I'm coming from Starsector which is a similar game. In starsector the combat is slower and importantly the combat is separate from the general map. otherwise i think endless skies's map is better and more developed than starsector. The economy is also better simulated than starsector. (Also this is just simple preference but i'm not a fan of the art style.) overall this game isn't like starsector like i had thought (unfortunately). If anyone knows any good alternatives to starsector feel free to tell me about it in the comments.

184963102.review: I tried playing this a few years back but wasn't too sure about the gameplay. Came back to it years later and gave it a proper chance. Love this game! Even though it seems simplistic, there is surprising depth to the mechanics, strategy, and story. A lot of flexibility to play how you want. For a free game its a definite must-try and I would definitely buy the game if it wasn't free.

184613247.review: Amazing game, the gfx aren't what this game about, it's about gameplay. Started because I was looking for a nice space trader, and this game really is. But now I'm playing missions, story line and got a big war fleet. The open world let's you do a lot and the story lines in it are perfect. It might be a game that has been around for a good bunch of years now, but still very cool to play.

184482091.review: great game, played it over and over

183909046.review: As a lover of Escape Velocity Nova, i am so happy i found this game. oh and its free imagine that.

183907281.review: The closest thing to EVN. Better than Star Wars
